name: Pocketchange Bar
text:
APPY HOUR - 1/2 APPETIZERS

5PM-9PM THURSDAYS & FRIDAYS

Join us for Happy Hour every Thursday and Friday from 5 PM to 9 PM! Enjoy 1/2 off all our appetizers, including our internet-famous nachos and crispy baked wings. Don't miss out!
GAME DAY DRAFT SPECIAL

$20

Cheer on your favorite team with our exclusive Penny Lager, crafted by Lakehead Brewing. Just $20 per pitcher during football, hockey, basketball, and even curling games!
FEATURE SNACK

KING BAO

$15
All hail the King Bao — a rebellious bite that takes no prisoners. We’re talking crispy, oven-roasted pork belly that’ll make your taste buds bow down. This bad boy is loaded with punchy pickled daikon and carrots, cool julienned cucumbers, and a reckless crunch of crushed peanuts. Topped off with fresh cilantro and wrapped in a fluffy steamed bao, this is one mouthful that rules with an iron fist. Dare to take the throne?

Strawberry Paper Plane: 12 1/2

Bourbon, aperol, amaro nonino, and freshly muddled strawberries, lemon juice with drizzle of olive oil.
Japanese Old Fashioned: 14 1/2

Japanese whisky, simple syrup, and a burst of flavor from angostura and yuzu bitters.
Kyoto Negroni: 14 1/2

A rice-washed twist on the classic. Japanese Roku Gin, premium sweet vermouth, Campari, and garnished with nori for a umami finish.
Mom, It's Not A Phase: 12 1/2

Barbados rum, Amaro Nonino, Angostura bitters, banana liqueur, fresh lime juice, pineapple juice, and a dash of crème de cacao for a rich, fruity, and slightly bitter finish.
Yuzu Soju Sour: 13 1/2

Korean soju, yuzu tea, lemon juice, simple syrup and frothy egg white for a velvety texture.
Espresso Martini: 13 1/2

Vodka, liquor 43, Kahlua coffee liqueur and chilled espresso, garnished with 3 espresso beans.
Gin Gin Mule: 13 1/2

Empress gin, lime juice, simple syrup, mint, ginger bitters, ginger beer topped with sugared ginger and mint that got a good spanking.
Coin Toss: 12 1/2

Raspberry vodka, Cointreau, lime juice, rosemary-infused simple syrup and cranberry juice. Garnish of fresh raspberries and a rosemary sprig.

DRAFT 生ビール

Penny Lager: 7
Introducing the exclusive Penny Lager - a German Style Helles Lager. This is a collaborative masterpiece brewed mischievously with Lakehead Brewery - a crisp and refreshing brew mischievously crafted to elevate your beer experience with a unique blend of flavours and easily crushable "drinkability".
L.O.T.W Lakeside Kölsch: 9
L.O.T.W Rotating Tap: 9
Dawson Trail Rotating Tap: 9
Bud: 8
Bud Light: 8
Stella: 10
Michelob Ultra: 8
Want a pint "N-Change"? Go from a 16oz pint to a 20oz for $2.00

SHOTS 射手

"IN THE POCKET" - 1 REDBULL + 1 CORONA + 2 SHOTS OF MANDRIN VODKA - IT'S WHAT YOU NEED TO START THE NIGHT OFF RIGHT! - $16
WINE

Bubbles

Spicy Virgin Margarita: $11

Non-alcoholic tequila, lime juice, pineapple juice, simple syrup, and a touch of saline solution, garnished with jalapeño and tajin.
Pocket Punch: $10

Fusion of pineapple, orange, and mango juices, complemented by a touch of strawberry syrup, lemon and lime juice, and a hint of minced ginger, topped with zesty punch ginger beer.
Sakura Old Fashioned: $12

Non-alcoholic whisky, simple syrup, and a burst of flavor from sakura (cherry blossom) bitters.
Red Bull: $5

Assorted Flavours.

Kitchen Hours: 5:00PM-11:00PM

HURRICANE POPCORN - 5

Fresh popcorn drizzled with a blend of melted butter, a hint of soy sauce, and a generous sprinkling of Nori Furikake (sesame seeds, nori seaweed, sugar, and salt).
WHIPPED FETA - 16

A creamy blend of feta, Creek yogurt, lemon, and olive oil, whipped to perfection and seasoned with salt and pepper. Topped with a drizzle of fine olive oil, hot honey, chili flakes and served with warm toasted pretzel.
ASIAN ST. NACHOS - 26

Garlic-infused ground pork made with a zesty blend of fresh lime juice, low-sodium soy sauce, then garnished with a medley of Monterey Jack cheese, thinly sliced red cabbage, jalapeño, and cilantro, finished with green onion and a drizzle of sriracha mayo.
BANG! DUMPLINGS - 16

S chicken and leek steamed jiaozi with a tantalizing spicy peanut soy sauce made from peanut butter, coconut milk, sugar, soy sauce, chili oil, minced garlic, toasted sesame seeds, and sesame oil.
KATSU SANDO - 15

Japanese-inspired hot dog. A caramelized all-beef hotdog is nestled between two pretzel buns, adorned with house-made katsu sauce, crispy panko bread crumbs, green onion, Kewpie mayo, and a sprinkle of sesame seeds.
POCKET NOODS - 11

Instant ramen noodles with a savory blend of low-sodium soy sauce, vegetarian hoisin sauce, rice vinegar, brown sugar, chili sauce, toasted sesame oil, minced garlic. Garnished with freshly grated ginger, sliced green onions, and a sprinkle of sesame seeds.
ADD a fried egg with chili oil on top or add three dumplings.

All items may contain traces of nuts or sesame.

If you have an allergy or intolerance, please let our staff know.

Dyno Wings 19

Crispy baked wings smothered in our secret tangy sauce, garnished with slivered green onions, sesame seeds, and a kick of Thai chilies. Note: Wings are freshly baked and might take time to prepare.
Classic Wings 19

Lemon Pepper, Shichimi Togarashi, Roasted Red Pepper, Franks Hot, Honey Garlic, Hot Honey. Note: Wings are freshly baked and might take time to prepare. 2 lbs. add $14
Stinging Bee 19

Experience the perfect blend of spice and sweetness with savory pepperoni, jalapeños, and a drizzle of hot honey.
Cheese, Cheese, Cheese 18

A very cheesy pizza... what else is there to say?
Gochujang Korean Pork 21

Introducing our Korean Twist Pizza! Crispy dough topped with smoky gochujang pizza sauce, tender garlic-infused ground pork, red onions, sweet pineapple, mozzarella, and cilantro. A guaranteed winner!
Truffle Mushroom 19

Indulge in our Truffle Mushroom Pizza, featuring a delectable combination of earthy truffle-infused olive oil, savory mushrooms, and gooey mozzarella cheese on a crispy crust. A sophisticated choice for any pizza lover!
ADD THE DIPPS 2

Choose to add on a side of dip:
Hot Honey
Ranch
Buffalo Hot Sauce
